Package com.android.slackandhay.input

This package contains all classes concerning the input, right now that's touch screen input only

See:
          Description

Class Summary
InputAction not implemented yet (should provide a more flexible user input in the future)
InputKeyboard not implemented yet (should provide keyboard input for android devices that support it)
InputSystem this class represents the input system in which all inputs (e.g.
InputTouch this class handles all the input from the touch screen
InputTouchButton This class is used to define Buttons on the touch screen The Buttons are defined independently from the screen resolution.
InputType not implemented yet
 

Enum Summary
InputAction.Action  
InputTouch.BUTTON_ACTIONS  
 

Package com.android.slackandhay.input Description

This package contains all classes concerning the input, right now that's touch screen input only
